segments.text: Waiter , we have been waiting for 20 minutes . Would you mind hurrying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , sir , the fish you ordered will take a longer time because we make it with fresh fish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . Would you please bring me some wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , is dry white wine OK ?
segments.speaker: S2
